DOC.brief_summary: - To investigate safety letrozole monotherapy dose 1.0 mg/day fadrozole monotherapy dose 2.0mg Japanese postmenopausal patient advance breast cancer participate double blind study .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study 1.0mg Dose Letrozole Therapy Postmenopausal Patients With Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Patients participate double blind study Patients intolerable toxicity . Patients confirm progressive disease double blind study . Patients receive concurrent anticancer therapy double blind study .
